Description: Deal 1 damage.

Name: Damage 5
Description: Deal 5 damage.

Name: Damage all but 1
Description: Set the Health of a character to 1.

Name: Damage all but 1
Description: Set the Health of a character to 1.

Name: Destory Hero Power
Description: Destroy a player's Hero Power.

Name: Destroy
Description: Destroy a minion or hero.

Name: Destroy All Heroes
Description: Destroy all heroes.

Name: Destroy All Minions
Description: Destroy all minions.

Name: Discard
Description: Choose a hero. That hero's controller discards his hand.

Name: Do Nothing
Description: This does nothing.

Name: Draw 3 Cards
Description: Draw 3 cards.

Name: Enable Emotes
Description: Enable emotes for your VS.AI game. (not in tutorials, though)

Name: Enable for Attack
Description: Give a character Charge and make him able to attack!

Name: Enchant
Description: Enchant a minion with an empty enchant.

Name: Exhaust
Description: Exhaust a character.

Name: Flame Burst
Description: Shoot 5 missiles at random enemies for 1 damage each.

Name: Freeze
Description: Freeze a character.

Name: Hand to Deck
Description: Shuffle a player's hand into his deck.

Name: Hogger SMASH!
Description: Deal 4 damage.

Name: Legacy of the Emperor
Description: Give your minions +2/+2. (+2 Attack/+2 Health)

Name: Metamorphosis
Description: Do something crazy.

Name: Mill
Description: Put 10 cards from a hero's deck into his graveyard.

Name: Mill 10
Description: Put 10 cards from a hero's deck into his graveyard.

Name: Mill 30
Description: Put 30 cards from a hero's deck into his graveyard.

Name: Molasses
Description: You can take as long as you want on your turn.

Name: Opponent Disconnect
Description: Force your opponnet to disconnect.

Name: Restore 1
Description: Restore 1 Health to a character.

Name: Restore 5
Description: Restore 5 Health to a character.

Name: Restore All Health
Description: Restore all Health to a character.

Name: Reveal Hand
Description: No description.

Name: Silence - debug
Description: Remove all enchantments and powers from a minion.

Name: Stomp
Description: Deal 2 damage to all enemies.

Name: Will of Mukla
Description: Restore 8 Health.

Name: Ancient Secrets
Description: Restore 8 Health.

Name: Ancient Teachings
Description: Draw 2 cards.

Name: Demigod's Favor
Description: Give your other minions +2/+2.

Name: Dispel
Description: Silence a minion.

Name: Excess Mana
Description: Draw a card. (You can only have 10 Mana in your tray.)

Name: Leader of the Pack
Description: Give all of your minions +1/+1.

Name: Nourish
Description: Draw 3 cards.

Name: Shan'do's Lesson
Description: Summon two 2/2 Treants with Taunt.

Name: Starfall
Description: Deal 2 damage to all enemies.

Name: Summon a Panther
Description: Summon a 3/2 Panther.

Name: Uproot
Description: +5 Attack.

Name: Claw
Description: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn and 2 Armor. The claw decides who will stay and who will go.

Name: Healing Touch
Description: Restore #8 Health. The technique for this Touch is only slightly different than the "TouchofIntensePain", and it takes years to learn the difference.

Name: Innervate
Description: Gain 2 Mana Crystals this turn only. Some druids still have flashbacks from strangers yelling "Innervateme!!" at them.

Name: Mark of the Wild
Description: Give a minion Taunt and +2/+2. (+2 Attack/+2 Health)

Name: Wild Growth
Description:
Gain an empty Mana Crystal. This spell has a chance of going horribly wrong and creating hundreds of full mana crystals.
It sounds good, but history tells us otherwise.

Name: Bear Form
Description: +2 Health and Taunt.

Name: Cat Form
Description: Charge

Name: Moonfire
Description: Deal 1 damage.

Name: Naturalize
Description: Destroy a minion. Your opponent draws 2 cards.

Name: Power of the Wild
Description:
Choose One - Give your minions +1/+1; or Summon a 3/2 Panther. Never look a panther in the eye. Or is it 'Always
look a panther in the eye'? Well, its one of those.

Name: Soul of the Forest
Description: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summona2/2Treant." Would a joke about "Bite" and "Bark" be appropriate?

Name: Starfire
Description: Deal 5 damage. Draw a card. If you see an opposing druid start to cast this spell, get into the fetal position.

Name: Swipe
Description: Deal 4 damage to an enemy and 1 damage to all other enemies. Goblins used to export Claw-Sharpeners to the Barrow Dens before the Cataclysm.

Name: Wrath
Description: Choose One - Deal 3 damage; or Deal 1 damage and draw a card. Hamuul Runetotem loves this card.

Name: Bite
Description: Give your hero +4 Attack this turn and 4 Armor. Chew your food!

Name: Savagery
Description: Deal damage equal to your hero's Attack to all enemy minions. Even the most timid druid becomes a savage beast when you take away his honey.

Name: Force of Nature
Description: Summon three 2/2 Treants with Charge that die at the end of the turn. "IthinkI'lljustnapunderthesetrees.Wait...AAAAAHHH!" - Blinkfizz, the Unfortunate Gnome

Name: Arcane Shot
Description: Deal 2 damage. Magi conjured arcane arrows to sell to hunters, until hunters learned just enough magic to do it themselves. The resulting loss of jobs sent Stormwind into a minor recession.

Name: Multi-Shot
Description: Deal 3 damage to two random enemy minions. You see, it's all about throughput.

Name: Tracking
Description:
Look at the top three cards of your deck. Draw one and discard the others. For the person who just cannot decide what card
to put in their deck!

Name: Animal Companion
Description: Summon a random Beast Companion. You could summon Misha, Leokk, or Huffer! Huffer is more trouble than he's worth.

Name: Deadly Shot
Description: Destroy a random enemy minion. Accuracy is not a highly valued trait among the mok'nathal. Deadliness is near the top, though.

Name: Explosive Trap
Description: Secret: When your hero is attacked, deal 2 damage to all enemies. It traps your food AND cooks it for you!

Name: Kill Command
Description: Deal 3 damage. If you have a Beast, deal 5 damage instead. "Kill!", he commanded.

Name: Snipe
Description: Secret: When your opponent plays a minion, deal 4 damage to it. A great sniper hits the spot. Just like a delicious flank of boar. Mmmmm.

Name: Unleash the Hounds
Description: Give your Beasts +1 Attack and Charge. You must read the name of this card out loud each time you play it.

Name: Explosive Shot
Description: Deal 5 damage to a minion and 2 damage to adjacent ones. Pull the pin, count to 5, then shoot. Then duck.

Name: Flare
Description: All minions lose Stealth. Destroy all enemy Secrets. Draw a card. Not only does it reveal your enemies, but its also great for parties!

Name: Misdirection
Description: Secret: When a character attacks your hero, instead he attacks another random character. Sometimes its as simple as putting on a fake mustache and pointing at someone else.

Name: Snake Trap
Description: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, summon three 1/1 Snakes. Why did it have to be snakes?

Name: Arcane Explosion
Description: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions. This spell is much better than Arcane Implosion.

Name: Arcane Intellect
Description: Draw 2 cards. Playing this card makes you SMARTER. And let's face it: we could all stand to be a little smarter.

Name: Arcane Missiles
Description: Shoot 3 missiles at random enemies for 1 damage each. You'd think you'd be able to control your missiles a little better since you're a powerful mage and all.

Name: Fireball
Description: Deal 6 damage. This spell is useful for burning things. If you're looking for spells that toast things, or just warm them a little, you're in the wrong place.

Name: Polymorph
Description: Transform a minion into a 1/1 Sheep. There was going to be a pun in this flavor text, but it just came out baa-d.

Name: Cone of Cold
Description: Freeze a minion and the minions next to it, and deal 1 damage to them. Magi of the Kirin Tor were casting Cubes of Cold for many years before Cones came into fashion some 90 years ago.

Name: Flamestrike
Description: Deal 4 damage to all enemy minions. When the ground is on fire, you should not stop, drop, and roll.

Name: Frost Bolt
Description: Deal 3 damage to a character and Freeze it.

Name: Frost Nova
Description: Freeze all enemy minions. Hey man, that's cold. Literally and metaphorically.

Name: Frostbolt
Description: Deal 3 damage to a character and Freeze it.

Name: Ice Barrier
Description: Secret: As soon as your hero is attacked, gain 8 Armor. This is Rank 1. Rank 2 is Chocolate Milk Barrier.

Name: Ice Lance
Description: Freeze a character. If it was already Frozen, deal 4 damage instead. The trick is not to break the lance. Otherwise, you have "IcePieces". Ice Pieces aren't as effective.

Name: Mirror Entity
Description: Secret: When your opponent plays a minion, summon a copy of it. "Yougofirst." - Krush'gor the Behemoth, to his pet boar.

Name: Blizzard
Description: Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions and Freeze them. This spell can be very Entertaining.

Name: Counterspell
Description:
Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, Counter it. What's the difference between a mage playing with Counterspell and
a mage who isn't? The mage who isn't is getting Pyroblasted in the face.

Name: Vaporize
Description: Secret: When a minion attacks your hero, destroy it. Rumor has it that Deathwing brought about the Cataclysm after losing a game to this card. We may never know the truth.

Name: Pyroblast
Description: Deal 10 damage. Take the time for an evil laugh after you draw this card.

Name: Hammer of Wrath
Description: Deal 3 damage. Draw a card.

Name: Hand of Protection
Description: Give a minion Divine Shield.

Name: Holy Light
Description: Restore #6 Health. If you are often bathed in Holy Light, you should consider wearing sunscreen.

Name: Consecration
Description: Deal 2 damage to all enemies. Consecrated ground glows with Holy energy. But it smells a little, too.

Name: Eye for an Eye
Description: Secret: When your hero takes damage, deal that much damage to the enemy hero.

Name: Humility
Description: Change a minion's Attack to 1. This card makes something really damp. Oh wait. That's "Humidity".

Name: Noble Sacrifice
Description: Secret: When an enemy attacks, summon a 2/1 Defender as the new target. We will always remember you, "Defender"!

Name: Redemption
Description: Secret: When one of your minions dies, return it to life with 1 Health.

Name: Repentance
Description: Secret: When your opponent plays a minion, reduce its Health to 1.

Name: Blessed Champion
Description: Double a minion's Attack. This card causes double the trouble AND double the fun.

Name: Divine Favor
Description: Draw cards until you have as many in hand as your opponent.

Name: Equality
Description: Change the Health of ALL minions to 1.

Name: Holy Wrath
Description: Draw a card and deal damage equal to its cost.

Name: Avenging Wrath
Description: Shoot 8 missiles at random enemies for 1 damage each.

Name: Lay on Hands
Description: Restore #8 Health. Draw 3 cards.

Name: Holy Smite
Description: Deal 2 damage. It doesn't matter how pious you are. Everyone needs a good smiting now and again.

Name: Mind Blast
Description: Deal 5 damage to the enemy hero. This spell blasts you directly in the MIND.

Name: Power Word: Shield
Description: Give a minion +3 Health. Sure the extra protection is nice, but the shield really reduces visibility.

Name: Shadow Word: Pain
Description: Destroy a minion with 3 or less Attack. A step up from a spell cast by many beginning acolytes: "ShadowWord: Annoy".

Name: Circle of Healing
Description: Restore #4 Health to ALL minions. It isn't really a circle.

Name: Divine Spirit
Description: Double a minion's Health. Double the trouble. Double the fun!

Name: Fade
Description: Give your minions Taunt. Draw a card. "Where'dhego?" "Forgetabouthim!Helpmewiththismurloc!"

Name: Holy Nova
Description: Deal 2 damage to all enemies. Restore #2 Health to all friendly characters. If the Holy Light forsakes you, good luck casting this spell. Also, you're probably a jerk.

Name: Mental Collapse
Description: Deal 1 damage to the enemy hero for each card in his hand. "IDON'TKNOWWHATWE'REYELLINGABOUT!!!"

Name: Mind Vision
Description: Put a copy of a random card in your opponent's hand into your hand.

Name: Penance
Description: Deal 3 damage. Restore 3 Health to your hero.

Name: Prayer of Fortitude
Description: Give your minions +1/+1. (+1 Attack/+1 Health) Good idea: Buffing your minions. Bad idea: Starting a conversation in the Barrens.

Name: Silence
Description: Silence a minion. Reserved for enemy spellcasters, evil liches from beyond the grave, and karaoke nights at the Grim Guzzler.

Name: Thoughtsteal
Description: Copy 2 cards from your opponent's deck and put them into your hand. "WhatdoyougetwhenyoucastThoughtstealonanOrc?Nothing!" - Tauren joke

Name: Greater Heal
Description: Restore 2 Health to a character for each card in your opponent's hand.

Name: Mass Dispel
Description: Silence all enemy minions. Draw a card.

Name: Shadow Madness
Description: Gain control of an enemy minion with 3 or less Attack until end of turn. You can rationalize it all you want, it's still a mean thing to do.

Name: Mindgames
Description: Put a copy of a random minion from your opponent's deck into the battlefield. Sometimes it feels like this is all a game.

Name: Shadowform
Description: Your Hero Power becomes 'Deal 2 damage'. If already in Shadowform: 3 damage.

Name: Assassinate
Description: Destroy an enemy minion. If you don't want to be assassinated, move to the Barrens and change your name. Good luck!

Name: Backstab
Description: Deal 2 damage to an enemy minion. It's funny how often yelling "Lookoverthere!" gets your opponent to turn around.

Name: Sap
Description: Return an enemy minion to its owner's hand.

Name: Sinister Strike
Description: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero. There's something about this strike that just feels off. Sinister, even.

Name: Betrayal
Description: An enemy minion deals its damage to the minions next to it. Everyone has a price. Gnomes, for example, can be persuaded by stuffed animals and small amounts of chocolate.

Name: Conceal
Description: Give your minions Stealth until your next turn.

Name: Eviscerate
Description: Deal 2 damage. Combo: Deal 4 damage instead.

Name: Fan of Knives
Description: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions. Draw a card. I wouldn't say I LOVE knives, but I'm definitely a fan.

Name: Shadowstep
Description: Return a friendly minion to your hand. It costs (2) less.

Name: Shiv
Description: Deal 1 damage. Draw a card.

Name: Sprint
Description: Draw 4 cards.

Name: Vanish
Description: Return all minions to their owner's hand.

Name: Blade Flurry
Description: Destroy your weapon and deal its damage to all enemies.

Name: Headcrack
Description: Deal 2 damage to the enemy hero. Combo: Return this to your hand next turn. When all else fails, nothing beats a swift whack upside the head.

Name: Adrenaline Rush
Description: Draw a card. Combo: Draw 2 cards instead. Rogues don't need to jump from the top of the 1000 Needles to get a burst of adrenaline.

Name: Ancestral Healing
Description: Restore a minion to full Health and give it Taunt. During battle, you can call upon the strength of your ancestors! So have a big family!

Name: Frost Shock
Description: Deal 1 damage to an enemy character and Freeze it. FROST SHOCK!

Name: Hex
Description: Transform a minion into a 0/1 Frog with Taunt.

Name: Rockbiter Weapon
Description: Give a friendly character +3 Attack this turn.

Name: Earth Shock
Description: Silence a minion, then deal 1 damage to it.

Name: Forked Lightning
Description: Deal 2 damage to 2 random enemy minions. Overload: (2)

Name: Lightning Bolt
Description: Deal 3 damage. Overload: (1) Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt!

Name: Ancestral Spirit
Description: Choose a minion. When that minion is destroyed, return it to the battlefield. It was just a flesh wound.

Name: Feral Spirit
Description: Summon two 2/3 Spirit Wolves with Taunt. Overload: (2)

Name: Lava Burst
Description: Deal 5 damage. Overload: (2) It's like an ocean of liquid magma in your mouth!

Name: Lightning Storm
Description: Deal 2-3 damage to all enemy minions. Overload: (2)

Name: Drain Life
Description: Deal 2 damage. Restore #2 Health to your hero. "I'vejustsuckedoneyearofyourlifeaway."

Name: Hellfire
Description: Deal 3 damage to ALL characters. It spells like these that make it hard for Warlocks to get decent help.

Name: Shadow Bolt
Description: Deal 4 damage to a minion.

Name: Death Coil
Description: Deal 1 damage to a minion. If that kills it, draw a card. If your spells look like horrifying skulls, let's be honest, you should get to draw some cards.

Name: Demonfire
Description: Deal 2 damage to a minion. If itÃ”Ã‡Ã–s a friendly Demon, give it +2/+2 instead.

Name: Grimoire of Sacrifice
Description:
Destroy a Demon. Restore 5 Health to your hero. This is not really a book you want to leave on your coffee
table.

Name: Mortal Coil
Description: Deal 1 damage to a minion. If that kills it, draw a card. If your spells look like horrifying skulls, let's be honest, you should get to draw some cards.

Name: Sacrificial Pact
Description: Destroy a Demon. Restore #5 Health to your hero.

Name: Sense Demons
Description: Put 2 random Demons from your deck into your hand.

Name: Soulfire
Description: Deal 4 damage. Discard a random card. Are you lighting a soul on fire? Or burning someone with your OWN soul? This seems like an important distinction.

Name: Shadowflame
Description: Destroy a friendly minion and deal its Attack damage to all enemy minions.

Name: Siphon Soul
Description: Destroy a minion. Restore #3 Health to your hero. You probably should avoid siphoning your own soul. You might create some kind of weird infinite loop.

Name: Bane of Doom
Description: Deal 2 damage to a character. If that kills it, summon a random Demon.

Name: Twisting Nether
Description: Destroy all minions. The Twisting Nether is a formless place of magic and illusion and destroyed minions.

Name: Charge
Description: Give a friendly minion Charge.

Name: Execute
Description: Destroy a damaged enemy minion.

Name: Heroic Strike
Description: Give your hero +4 Attack this turn.

Name: Battle Rage
Description: Draw a card for each damaged minion. "Youwon'tlikemewhenI'mangry."

Name: Cleave
Description: Deal 2 damage to two random enemy minions. Hey you twoÃ”Ã‡Âªcould you stand next to each other for a secondÃ”Ã‡Âª

Name: Inner Rage
Description: Deal 1 damage to a minion. It gains +2 Attack this turn. They're only smiling on the outside.

Name: Rampage
Description: Give a damaged minion +3/+3.

Name: Shield Block
Description: Gain 5 Armor. Draw a card.

Name: Slam
Description: Deal 2 damage to a minion. If it survives, draw a card.

Name: Whirlwind
Description: Deal 1 damage to ALL minions. The way to tell seasoned warriors from novice ones: the novices yell "wheeeee" while whirlwinding.

Name: Mortal Strike
Description: Deal 4 damage. If your hero has 12 or less Health, deal 6 damage instead.

Name: Upgrade!
Description: If you have a weapon, give it +1/+1. Otherwise equip a 1/3 weapon.

Name: Brawl
Description: Destroy all minions except one. (chosen randomly)

Name: Shield Slam
Description: Deal 1 damage to a minion for each Armor you have.
